title: Question - scripts

embed.description: Vidme is the simplest way to upload and share videos, no signup required.

body:
Hi, I don't play cass, ever. I think I played her once. This guy deleted me on lvl 2 and he just walked spamming the spikes. I couldn't record that video, but I spectated a few mins of his next game & this is what I took from there. 
Is this normal Cassiopeia or scripting? I will try to spectate his early lvls next time, because that is when he has it on for sure, because this could be doable without scripts I think.
Thanks
Edit: Specifically focusing on the fangs spam, not skillshots.

replies.body:
Well who knows... you could make a ticked to RITO support anyways and let them look if there's something fishy going on. 

Usually you don't just spam that fast, even with smart cast. But if you are going to spectate him more, try to pay attention how he is dodging skillshots. The way he dodged Noc's pool-thingy, looked a little suspicious.

He missed his W. He wasn't scripting. People were just running in and not trying to dodge his Q. That's on them lol.. Killing Ziggs was easy cuz he didn't try to change path. Graves just walked straight in to get hit by an easy Q.
I mean the spikes spamming. The poisons weren't scripted. Just the speed she uses the E or w/e the fangs are.

Quick cast.

Try it sometime.
I know about the quick cast.

You obviously don't.
Nor you know what scripting actually is.

Thats not scripting. Read her abilities. The cooldown in her fangs is reset if she uses it on a poisoned target. So yea she can just keep spamming it. She`s not doing anything outside of normal. Look at Cass youtube videos, some people do it even faster than that.
Her Twin Fang CD is drastically decreased when used on a poisoned target. If she hits a non-poisoned target, the CD is normal.

Yeah. That's just her kit. If she uses her machine gun ability on someone who is poisoned, then the cooldown is reduced to 0.5 seconds. Don't ask why Riot made her a machine gun champ when she was a perfect DoT champion though.
Tell that to the OP that thinks the short CD was scripting. He even got an upvote...

What? I never said anything about short CD. I can not imagine myself being able to click "walk" and quickast like this. I m only gold V so I dont consider myself pro, but with this skill I d prolly be somewhere else.
This type of move attacking is exactly what ADC's do, except instead of right clicking on you the Cass hits E as close as possible to the minimum interval.
Again, it's more the speed and that she fired that one twin fang _behind _ her.

Just because he missed  something doesn't mean he's not scripting... if you didn't know this already, there is a in-build setting _(in the scripting program)_ to make every Xth skill miss _(or to make X skills hit you in the face when it comes to the dodging script)_, to not make things look too obvious.

You don't have to be a genius to know he's scripting, just pay attention when noct  used Q on him he dodge it while sending a twin fang to ziggs... so unless you're a god and play below 40 pings, i doubt anyone is able to do it in normal circumstances...
Thats not scripting, that cassio miss skills and didnt evade that graves ult

"Herrrrrp, totally normal" "Errrr, not scripting! Quick cast, you SUCK!"
Well he hasn't played since the report and before that he played ~5 games a day. So unless he died, he was banned.
Definetely not scripting, just a good player who uses quick cast, it's very efficient in Cassiopeia. Stop whining and accept he just beats your ass.

it looks a lot like scripting, but does cass's E cancel her move command?  they could have gotten lucky with the over the wall kill because it is a targeted ability, but that is a bit too good for cass

People who find this impossible would think all Challenger ADC's are scripting, because this is exactly the way they move to stutter-step. You can make a move command and click (or here, mouse over) an enemy then have your cursor back again to send another move command within the .5 second window if you're simply very practiced at it.

Watch the good pros stream. Some of them even do insane accuracy training minigames while in queue to perfect this (mostly the Koreans. They aren't naturally gaming gods, they train to be that way).
Twin fang cd on a poisoned target is .5 seconds. She can hit her E 6 times in the duration of a Q. Cass is just a scary champion.
Its not scripting... it's called quick cast.
Why am I being downvoted? lol...
